page.title: 16Games Children Play
page.content: GAMES CHILDREN PLAY:in school-football FOOTBALL is a game played with an inflated ball on a grass field.You try to kick the ball between two white posts with a bar across the top so scoring a goal.The team with the most goals at the end of the match wins the game.A match usually lasts for ninety minutes with a half time break at 45 minutes.There are 11 players in each team, one of which is called goalkeeper,the only player who can handle the ball.You can touch the ball with head,foot,thigh and chest.A referee controls the game,awarding free kicks,penalties,corners or goal kicks.A free kick is given when a player has been kicked,tripped,blocked pulled or pushed.A penalty is given when one of the above offences has been committed by a defending player in the marked box before the goals.
